text: Hi Emma, apologies for the delayed response - I've had trouble logging into my account recently

Yeah I think I want to get into compositing, but at this early stage I'm willing to go into anything open minded and seeing what other areas are like. But compositing is the one I've an interest in at the moment.

I'm not currently learning any software. I've been watching tutorial videos on some of the basics of Nuke, but haven't had any practical hands on experience (bar a day I spent at the farm) using any software.
Ahhh that is interesting. I would start having a play with what software you can to see what your skills are best applied to.
